resources.string:
->This application shows the News Sources and upon clicking them shows the Articles. 
 	 ->The news sources and Artciles are obtained from News API goto -> www.newsapi.org. 
 	 ->The unique feature of this application is you can add the specific Articles to calender and can refer them whenever you want in future. 
 	 ->However I do not hold any responsibility for retaining of articles because it depends on availability from the source. 
 	 ->As long as there is availability from source, you can refer to the article at any point after adding to the Calender. 
 	 ->The article content is stored in your Internal Storage. 
 	 ->There are only few countries and few sources. We will update you for any further sources and countries according to availability. 
 	 ->Please rate us in Play Store. 
 	 ->Icon credits goto -> https://icons8.com/web-app/21093/News
